bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of ju 疽 , impediment-illness, somewhat similar to a yong 疽 , obstruction-illness, with pus like the juice of small beans. They vanish one day and are filled again the next. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yun tai 芸薹 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 : 疽似癰而小有 異 , “Impediment-illness reminiscent of obstruction-illnesses but smaller. They are strange”, writes: 異疽似癰 , “ Strange impediment-illness reminiscent of obstruction-illness”.
